etomica.config

Class ConformationLinear

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.config.ConformationLinear
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConformation, java.io.Serializable

    public class ConformationLinear
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConformation, java.io.Serializable
    Places atoms in a straight line. Does not zero total momentum. Can be used to implement a 1D linear conformation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
